call.--product: Target a device within the given Product ID or Slug  [string]

compile.--target: The firmware version to compile against. Defaults to latest version, or version on device for cellular.  [string]

flash.--cloud: Flash over the air to the device. Default if no other flag provided  [boolean]
flash.--usb: Flash over USB using the DFU utility  [boolean]
flash.--serial: Flash over a virtual serial port  [boolean]
flash.--factory: Flash user application to the factory reset location. Only available for DFU  [boolean]
flash.--force: Flash even when binary does not pass pre-flash checks  [boolean]
flash.--target: The firmware version to compile against. Defaults to latest version, or version on device for cellular.  [string]
flash.--port: Use this serial port instead of auto-detecting. Useful if there are more than 1 connected device. Only available for serial  [string]

get.--time: Show the time when the variable was received  [boolean]
get.--product: Target a device within the given Product ID or Slug  [string]

identify.--port: Use this serial port instead of auto-detecting. Useful if there are more than 1 connected device  [string]

login.-t: --token     an existing Particle access token to use  [string]
login.--otp: the login code if two-step authentication is enabled  [string]

monitor.--time: Show the time when the variable was received  [boolean]
monitor.--delay: Interval in milliseconds between variable fetches  [number]

nyan.--product: Target a device within the given Product ID or Slug  [string]

preprocess.--name: Filename and path to include in the preprocessed file. Default to the input file name  [string]

publish.--private: Publish to the private stream  [boolean] [default: true]
publish.--product: Publish to the given Product ID or Slug's stream  [string]

setup.--wifi: Force setup over WiFi even if a device is connected to USB  [boolean]

subscribe.--all: Listen to all events instead of just those from my devices  [boolean]
subscribe.--device: Listen to events from this device only  [string]
subscribe.--until: Listen until we see an event exactly matching this data  [string]
subscribe.--max: Listen until we see this many events  [number]
subscribe.--product: Target a device within the given Product ID or Slug  [string]
